title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions
OB: The files that were previously opened in the application are not appearing in the File menu's Most Recently Used (MRU) list after restarting the application.
EB: The files that were previously opened in the application should appear in the File menu's Most Recently Used (MRU) list even after restarting the application.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Open a few files.
3. Close the application.
4. Restart the application.
5. Check the File menu's Most Recently Used (MRU) list to see if the previously opened files are listed.
